    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reaction products of an acid and an alkali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion Produkte einer Säure und des Alkalis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Produits de réaction d'un acide et d'un alcali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Produtos da reação de um ácido e de um 
alcalóide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prodotti di reazione di un acido e di un alcali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προϊόντα αντίδρασης ενός οξέος και ενός αλκαλίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Productos de la reacción de un ácido y de un 
álcali</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that reaction of an acid (hydrochloric acid) with alkali (potassium hydroxide) produces salt (potassium chloride) and water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutralisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Reaktion einer Säure 
(Salzsäure) mit Alkali (Kaliumhydroxid) Salz (Kaliumchlorverbindung) 
und Wasser produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la réaction d'un 
acide (acide chlorhydrique) avec de l'alcali (hydroxyde de potassium) 
produit le sel (chlorure de potassium) et l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a reação de um 
ácido (ácido hydrochloric) com alcalóide (hydroxide do potassium) 
produz o sal (cloreto do potassium) e a água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la reazione di un 
acido (acido cloridrico) con l'alcali (idrossido del potassio) produce
il sale (cloruro del potassio) e l'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η αντίδραση ενός 
οξέος (υδροχλωρικό οξύ) με το αλκάλιο (υδροξείδιο καλίου) 
παράγει το άλας (χλωρίδιο καλίου) και το ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la reacción de un 
ácido (ácido hidroclórico) con el álcali (hidróxido del potasio) 
produce la sal (cloruro del potasio) y el agua.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
